text.div:
RestfulOperation

A code that describes the kind of restful operations that are defined

This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-operations

CodeDisplayDefinition
readRead the current state of the resource
vreadRead the state of a specific version of the resource
updateUpdate an existing resource by its id (or create it if it is new)
deleteDelete a resource
historyRetrieve a set of history entries
history-instanceRetrieve the update history for a resource instance
validateCheck that the content would be acceptable as an update
history-typeGet a list of updates to resources of this type
createCreate a new resource with a server assigned id
searchSearching for a set of resources that meet some criteria
search-typeSearching a resource type using the parameters described in its profile
transactionTransaction performed on multiple resources
search-systemSearching all resource types using the parameters described in the profiles
history-systemGet a list of updates to all resources on the system

name: RestfulOperation
description: A code that describes the kind of restful operations that are defined

Retrieve a set of history entries
Retrieve the update history for a resource instance
Check that the content would be acceptable as an update
Get a list of updates to resources of this type
Create a new resource with a server assigned id
Searching for a set of resources that meet some criteria
Searching a resource type using the parameters described in its profile
Searching all resource types using the parameters described in the profiles
Get a list of updates to all resources on the system
